 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּטִּישׁ‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Jer.50.23|Jer 50:23]]</sup> ==forge-hammer==; — (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Aramaic loan-word according to [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>85, and</sup> so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (compare Arabic tradition in [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]), see [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּטִּישָׁא‎</span>; but [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 103</sup> compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***swine's snout***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flat-nosed***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> absolute [[Isa.41.7|Isa 41:7]]; [[Jer.23.29|Jer 23:29]] construct [[Jer.50.23|Jer 50:23]] figurative of Babylonian as destroyer.
